mapper.sql: ID, ORDER_ID, MERCHANT_NO, MERCHANT_NAME, ORDER_SN, PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_SKU_ID, PRODUCT_PRICE, ORDER_CASH, ORDER_INTEGRATION, FREIGHT_AMOUNT, COUPON_TYPE, INTEGRATION_COUPON_AMOUNT, PRODUCT_COUPON_AMOUNT, INTEGRATION_PAY_FLAG, PAYMENT_TIME, BATCH_NO, ORDER_TYPE, CASH_FREIGHT_AMOUNT, CREATE_TIME,DISCOUNT_AMOUNT
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from TRADE_DETAIL_REPORT
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into TRADE_DETAIL_REPORT (ID, ORDER_ID, MERCHANT_NO, MERCHANT_NAME, ORDER_SN, PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_SKU_ID, PRODUCT_PRICE, ORDER_CASH, ORDER_INTEGRATION, FREIGHT_AMOUNT, COUPON_TYPE, INTEGRATION_COUPON_AMOUNT, PRODUCT_COUPON_AMOUNT, INTEGRATION_PAY_FLAG, PAYMENT_TIME, BATCH_NO, ORDER_TYPE, CASH_FREIGHT_AMOUNT, CREATE_TIME,DISCOUNT_AMOUNT ) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productSkuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderCash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderIntegration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{freightAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{couponType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{integrationCouponAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productCouponAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{integrationPayFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paymentTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cashFreightAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{discountAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )

mapper.update:
update TRADE_DETAIL_REPORT

update TRADE_DETAIL_REPORT
ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MERCHANT_NO = #{merchantNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MERCHANT_NAME = #{merchantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_SN = #{orderSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_SKU_ID = #{productSkuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_PRICE = #{productPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_CASH = #{orderCash,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_INTEGRATION = #{orderIntegration,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FREIGHT_AMOUNT = #{freightAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COUPON_TYPE = #{couponType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INTEGRATION_COUPON_AMOUNT = #{integrationCouponAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_COUPON_AMOUNT = #{productCouponAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INTEGRATION_PAY_FLAG = #{integrationPayFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAYMENT_TIME = #{paymentTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BATCH_NO = #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_TYPE = #{orderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CASH_FREIGHT_AMOUNT = #{cashFreightAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update TRADE_DETAIL_REPORT set ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MERCHANT_NO = #{merchantNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MERCHANT_NAME = #{merchantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_SN = #{orderSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_SKU_ID = #{productSkuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_PRICE = #{productPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_CASH = #{orderCash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_INTEGRATION = #{orderIntegration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FREIGHT_AMOUNT = #{freightAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COUPON_TYPE = #{couponType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INTEGRATION_COUPON_AMOUNT = #{integrationCouponAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_COUPON_AMOUNT = #{productCouponAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INTEGRATION_PAY_FLAG = #{integrationPayFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAYMENT_TIME = #{paymentTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BATCH_NO = #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_TYPE = #{orderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CASH_FREIGHT_AMOUNT = #{cashFreightAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
select * from TRADE_DETAIL_REPORT where PAYMENT_TIME >= to_char(#{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') and PAYMENT_TIME < to_char(#{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and MERCHANT_NO = #{merchantNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.delete: delete from TRADE_DETAIL_REPORT where trunc(CREATE_TIME) = trunc(#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
